company.mission: Our Mission is to create a reliable and cost-effective food waste management system

company_description.overview: Solwearth Ecotech Pvt. Ltd. is India's leading manufacturer of automatic organic waste converters. The company focuses on social commitment and sustainable development, combining robust technology, expertise, and dedicated support to provide revolutionary food waste management solutions.
company_description.value_proposition: We have developed revolutionary food waste converter machines that meet the diverse waste management needs of businesses, from small restaurants to large-scale kitchens.
company_description.experience: Over 6 years of proven track record in organic waste management
company_description.market_position: Leading manufacturer of organic waste converters in India and Middle East

technology.name: Organic Waste Converter (OWC)
technology.type: Fully Automatic Food Waste Management System
technology.process: Multi-stage indirect heat and dry decomposition
key_features: Requires minimal space, power, and labor
Fully automatic operation with one-touch control
Reduces waste volume by up to 90%
Processes waste in less than 24 hours
Operates without emissions, smoke, or odor
No need for bacteria, additives, or water
Safety interlocks - impeller stops when door opens
advantages: 83-90% wet waste volume reduction in 12-30 hours
Converts organic waste into valuable soil supplements/compost
environmental_benefits: Prevents methane emissions from organic waste decomposition
Reduces transportation costs and carbon footprint
Produces natural alternative to chemical fertilizers

frequently_asked_questions.question: How long does it take to convert waste to compost?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Depending on the model and capacity, our machines process waste in 12-30 hours. Most models complete the process in less than 24 hours.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What types of waste can be processed?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Our machines handle all types of organic waste including food waste (cooked and raw), vegetables, fruits, yard waste, garden waste, and biodegradable paper products.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Do I need to add bacteria or additives?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: No. Our machines use multi-stage indirect heat and dry decomposition technology and do not require any bacteria, additives, chemicals, or water.

frequently_asked_questions.question: How much waste reduction can I expect?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Our machines achieve 83-90% volume reduction of wet organic waste.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Is there any odor during operation?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: No. All models have integrated deodorization systems ensuring odor-free operation.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What is the power consumption?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Power consumption varies by model from 2.8 Kw (SE-501) to 12 Kw (SE-1H).

frequently_asked_questions.question: What is the warranty period?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: All models come with a standard 1-year warranty with ongoing maintenance and support available.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Do I need special installation?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: No. Our machines are portable stand-alone units that require no special installation.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What is the output product?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: The output is high-quality compost suitable for landscaping, gardening, and agriculture - a natural alternative to chemical fertilizers.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Which model is right for my facility?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Model selection depends on your daily waste generation. Contact us for a free consultation and we'll recommend the right capacity for your needs.

for_ai_agents: Product recommendations based on capacity needs
